mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order (order_sn, trade_no, pay_type, user_id, user_snapshot_id, good_id, good_snapshot_id, pay_fee) VALUES (#{orderSN,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userSnapshotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodSnapshotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payFee,jdbcType=INTEGER});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_order WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND order_sn = #{orderSN,jdbcType=BIGINT};
mapper.select: select id,order_sn,trade_no,pay_type,good_id,pay_fee,status,user_id from tb_order where user_id = #{userId} LIMIT #{offset},#{limit};
mapper.update: update tb_order set status = #{status},update_at = now() WHERE id = #{id};
